t: John 15
The Vine and the Branches
“I*rp am*r the*r true*r vine,*r and*r my*r Father*r is*r the*r gardener.*r
He*r cuts*r off*r every*r branch*r in*r me*r that*r bears*r no*r fruit,*r while*r every*r branch*r that*r does*r bear*r fruit*r he*r prunes*r so*r that*r it*r will*r be*r even*r more*r fruitful.*r
You*r are*r already*r clean*r because*r of*r the*r word*r I*r have*r spoken*r to*r you.*r

Remain*r in*r me,*r as*r I*r also*r remain*r in*r you.*r No*r branch*r can*r bear*r fruit*r by*r itself;*r it*r must*r remain*r in*r the*r vine.*r Neither*r can*r you*r bear*r fruit*r unless*r you*r remain*r in*r me.*r
“I*rp am*r the*r vine;*r you*r are*r the*r branches.*r If*r you*r remain*r in*r me*r and*r I*r in*r you,*r you*r will*r bear*r much*r fruit;*r apart*r from*r me*r you*r can*r do*r nothing.*r

If*r you*r do*r not*r remain*r in*r me,*r you*r are*r like*r a*r branch*r that*r is*r thrown*r away*r and*r withers;*r such*r branches*r are*r picked*r up,*r thrown*r into*r the*r fire*r and*r burned.*r
If*r you*r remain*r in*r me*r and*r my*r words*r remain*r in*r you,*r ask*r whatever*r you*r wish,*r and*r it*r will*r be*r done*r for*r you.*r
This*r is*r to*r my*r Father’s*r glory,*r that*r you*r bear*r much*r fruit,*r showing*r yourselves*r to*r be*r my*r disciples.*r
“As*rp the*r Father*r has*r loved*r me,*r so*r have*r I*r loved*r you.*r Now*r remain*r in*r my*r love.*r
If*r you*r keep*r my*r commands,*r you*r will*r remain*r in*r my*r love,*r just*r as*r I*r have*r kept*r my*r Father’s*r commands*r and*r remain*r in*r his*r love.*r
I*r have*r told*r you*r this*r so*r that*r my*r joy*r may*r be*r in*r you*r and*r that*r your*r joy*r may*r be*r complete.*r
My*r command*r is*r this:*r Love*r each*r other*r as*r I*r have*r loved*r you.*r
Greater*r love*r has*r no*r one*r than*r this:*r to*r lay*r down*r one’s*r life*r for*r one’s*r friends.*r
You*r are*r my*r friends*r if*r you*r do*r what*r I*r command.*r

I*r no*r longer*r call*r you*r servants,*r because*r a*r servant*r does*r not*r know*r his*r master’s*r business.*r Instead,*r I*r have*r called*r you*r friends,*r for*r everything*r that*r I*r learned*r from*r my*r Father*r I*r have*r made*r known*r to*r you.*r

You*r did*r not*r choose*r me,*r but*r I*r chose*r you*r and*r appointed*r you*r so*r that*r you*r might*r go*r and*r bear*r fruit—fruit*r that*r will*r last—and*r so*r that*r whatever*r you*r ask*r in*r my*r name*r the*r Father*r will*r give*r you.*r
This*r is*r my*r command:*r Love*r each*r other.*r
The World Hates the Disciples
“If*rp the*r world*r hates*r you,*r keep*r in*r mind*r that*r it*r hated*r me*r first.*r

If*r you*r belonged*r to*r the*r world,*r it*r would*r love*r you*r as*r its*r own.*r As*r it*r is,*r you*r do*r not*r belong*r to*r the*r world,*r but*r I*r have*r chosen*r you*r out*r of*r the*r world.*r That*r is*r why*r the*r world*r hates*r you.*r

Remember*r what*r I*r told*r you:*r ‘A*r servant*r is*r not*r greater*r than*r his*r master.’*r If*r they*r persecuted*r me,*r they*r will*r persecute*r you*r also.*r If*r they*r obeyed*r my*r teaching,*r they*r will*r obey*r yours*r also.*r
They*r will*r treat*r you*r this*r way*r because*r of*r my*r name,*r for*r they*r do*r not*r know*r the*r one*r who*r sent*r me.*r
If*r I*r had*r not*r come*r and*r spoken*r to*r them,*r they*r would*r not*r be*r guilty*r of*r sin;*r but*r now*r they*r have*r no*r excuse*r for*r their*r sin.*r
Whoever*r hates*r me*r hates*r my*r Father*r as*r well.*r

If*r I*r had*r not*r done*r among*r them*r the*r works*r no*r one*r else*r did,*r they*r would*r not*r be*r guilty*r of*r sin.*r As*r it*r is,*r they*r have*r seen,*r and*r yet*r they*r have*r hated*r both*r me*r and*r my*r Father.*r
But*r this*r is*r to*r fulfill*r what*r is*r written*r in*r their*r Law:*r ‘They*r hated*r me*r without*r reason.’*r
The Work of the Holy Spirit
“When*rp the*r Advocate*r comes,*r whom*r I*r will*r send*r to*r you*r from*r the*r Father—the*r Spirit*r of*r truth*r who*r goes*r out*r from*r the*r Father—he*r will*r testify*r about*r me.*r
And*r you*r also*r must*r testify,*r for*r you*r have*r been*r with*r me*r from*r the*r beginning.*r
